venue.name: Center of Arts at the Armory

item.description:
Celebrate local community and fabulous brew at Harvest Fest!

Admission is free, but for $12 you can enjoy unlimited food, beer and wine samples from local restaurants (Redbones, Highland Kitchen, & more) and breweries (Shipyard, Magic Hat, Haverhill, Longtrail & more).

If you stick around till 5:00, see Yelp Boston participate in the fall fashion show with Suneri, Black and Blue, and Poor Little Rich Girl. Stop in to enjoy the festivities and check out the new cool weather vintage style (preview left) inspiration and the rest of the awesome local participants!

To learn more: www.artsatthearmory.org
item.name: FYI Harvest Fest 2009: Celebration of Local Biz, Food, Libations, Music & Art!
